names.pinyin: jian pi wen shen jiang tang fang
names.english: fortify the spleen, warm the kidneys and lower blood sugar formula
names.commonEnglish: Fortify the Spleen, Warm the Kidneys and Lower Blood Sugar Formula

actions: Strongly enriches Yin and relieves wasting and thirsting disorder.
With Shan Zhu Yu and Shan Yao, for dizziness, weak and sore back, impotence, spermatorrhea and night sweats, due to Kidney and Liver Yin Deficiency.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
With Shu Di Huang, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency.
Tonifies the Spleen, nourishes Stomach Yin,stops diarrhea, tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
With Shu Di Huang and Shan Zhu Yu, for Kidney Deficiency with spermatorrhea and night sweats.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Gan Jiang, warms the Spleen and Kidneys, benefits Yang and disperses Cold.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Yang Deficiency with a cold, painful abdomen, vomiting and watery diarrhea.
With Bai Zhu and Gan Jiang, for internal ascendance of Yin Cold leading to lack of arousal of Spleen Yang with abdominal pain and Cold with watery diarrhea.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and strengthens Kidney Yang.
With Shu Di Huang, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
With Shu Di Huang, Shan Yao and Gou Qi Zi, for True Yin Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, stabilizes Jing, astringes urine, tonifies and warms Spleen Yang and stops diarrhea.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
With Cang Zhu, for vaginal discharge.
With Gan Jiang, eliminates Cold Dampness in the Spleen with loss of taste, a sticky sensation in the mouth, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea and a thick, white tongue coat.
Tonifies the Spleen, astringes diarrhea, tonifies the Kidneys and astringes Jing.
With Shan Yao and Bai Zhu, for chronic diarrhea due to Spleen Deficiency.
Strongly reduces Food Stagnation, improves the Spleen's transportive function, astringes Jing and urine and stops enuresis.
Astringes the Intestines, stops diarrhea, astringes sweat and astringes the Kidneys.
Warms the Middle and expels Cold.
With Bai Zhu, for frequent diarrhea due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for debilitated Spleen and Kidney Yang with incessant diarrhea.
Warms and Reinforces the Spleen and Kidneys
Regulates Yin and Yang

symptoms: Low back, knees and abdomen feel cold and painful
Lower abdomen feels cold and painful
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or White and greasy
manifestations.pulse: Deep, thready, weak and maybe slow

modifications.purpose: a black facial complexion and cold limbs
